commands: echo '=== Current nginx config for api.codingeverest.com ==='

sudo cat /etc/nginx/sites-enabled/* 2>/dev/null | grep -B 5 -A 20 'api.codingeverest' || sudo cat /etc/nginx/conf.d/* 2>/dev/null | grep -B 5 -A 20 'api.codingeverest' || echo 'Config not found in standard locations'
curl -s http://localhost:8080/api/health || echo 'API not responding on 8080'
